title: Faith in Practice Week 2 with Annie F. Downs
description:
On the second episode of our Faith in Practice series, Raechel and Amanda explore six spiritual practices with good friend, author, and fellow podcaster Annie F. Downs. The three talk about serving, using Instagram carousels to memorize Scripture, and how spiritual disciplines train the heart toward Jesus. Annie tells us why she recites the Apostles’ Creed while making tea in the morning, and we learn that spiritual practices and the Body of Christ cannot exist independently from one another. Together, we can let ourselves be beginners, invite each other into the process, and pursue spiritual practices “imperfectly and with conviction.” 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Faith in Practice reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Faith in Practice collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/faith-in-practice-week-2-with-annie-f-downs/
